comment: Smart Data Models - Data Package adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.FrictionlessData/master/DataPackageFrictionlessData/schema.json
description: Data Package is a simple specification for data access and delivery.Converted for Smart Data Models initiative from original frictionless data

contents.name: created
contents.comment: Created. The datetime must conform to the string formats for datetime as described in [RFC3339](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3339#section-5.6). The datetime on which this descriptor was created

contents.name: description
contents.comment: Description. . A text description. Markdown is encouraged

contents.name: homepage
contents.comment: Home Page. . The home on the web that is related to this data package

contents.name: image
contents.comment: Image. A image to represent this package

contents.name: name
contents.comment: Name. This is ideally a url-usable and human-readable name. Name `SHOULD` be invariant, meaning it `SHOULD NOT` change when its parent descriptor is updated. An identifier string. Lower case characters with `.`, `_`, `-` and `/` are allowed

contents.name: profile
contents.comment: Profile. Every Package and Resource descriptor has a profile. The default profile, if none is declared, is `data-package` for Package and `data-resource` for Resource. The profile of this descriptor

contents.name: contributors
contents.comment: Contributors. The contributors to this descriptor

contents.name: keywords
contents.comment: Keywords. . A list of keywords that describe this package

contents.name: licenses
contents.comment: Licenses. This property is not legally binding and does not guarantee that the package is licensed under the terms defined herein. The license(s) under which this package is published

contents.name: resources
contents.comment: Data Resources. An `array` of Data Resource objects, each compliant with the [Data Resource](/data-resource/) specification

contents.name: sources
contents.comment: Sources. The raw sources for this resource
